name: Red Hulk
text: Forced Interrupt: When Red Hulk makes a basic thwart against a scheme, it gains assault until the end of the phase. Response: After you change to this form, place up to 3 heat counter on Overheating.

name: Thaddeus Ross
text: Forced Response: After you change to this form, remove all heat counter from Overheating. Remove 1 acceleration ([acceleration]) token from Fury. Master Tactitian — Action: Draw 2 cards. Choose and discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Overheating
text: Permanent. Setup. If there are 8 counters on Overheating, you are defeated. Forced Response (Hero): After the player phase ends, discard X card from the top of your deck, where X is the number of heat counters here. Place 1 heat counter here.

name: Fury
text: Permanent. Setup. Forced Response: After you discard cards from the top of your deck, if you discarded at least 5 cards, place 1 acceleration ([acceleration]) token on Fury.

name: Machine Man
text: Action: Discard Machine Man → change your form (flip your identity card). ”If I am a toy, then I must require adult supervision.”

name: Smash
text: Hero Response: After this card is discarded from the top of your deck, add it to your hand. Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Hero Action (attack): Deal 7 damage to an enemy.

name: Rage
text: Hero Response: After this card is discarded from the top of your deck, add it to your hand. Deal 1 damage to each enemy. Hero Action: Deal 3 damage to the villain and 1 damage to each minion.

name: Military Intelligence
text: Response: After this card is discarded from the top of your deck, add it to your hand. Remove 1 threat from a scheme. Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme.

name: Get Prepared
text: Response: After this card is discarded from the top of your deck, add it to your hand. Action: Pay the printed cost of a support or an upgrade in your discard pile → put that card into play under your control.

name: Gamma Absorption
text: Hero Response: After this card is discarded from the top of your deck, add it to your hand. Heal 2 damage from Red Hulk.

name: Annie
text: Action: Exhaust Annie → shuffle an identity-specific card from your discard pile into your deck. “Why are you going alone ?” — Red Hulk

name: Gamma Base
text: Resource: Exhaust Gamma Base → generate a [wild] resource.

name: Gamma Emission
text: Hero Response: After you play a [[gamma ]]card, exhaust Gamma Emission → deal damage to an enemy equal to that cards's printed cost.

name: Enhanced Stamina
text: You get +4 health points. Hero interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage, exhaust Enhanced Stamina → prevent 1 of that damage.

name: A-Bomb
text: Liée (Force Gamma). Réponse forcée : après que A-Bomb a attaqué, défaussez la carte du dessus de votre deck. Si cette carte a comme ressource imprimée [energy], Infligez 1 dégât à chaque personnage. Sont ils vraiment des alliés fiables ?
